thread.title: Phillip Ely
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Phillip Ely

author: Phillip Ely
title: Phillip Ely
text:
We bought a 10 puzzle set, and love it !!
When your done with one there's another waiting.
We have alot of winter here in Michigan and its great to have a puzzle on the table and a fire going .
We will be buying more in the future.
Thank you
